title: Georgia House - Day 22 (2026-02-24)
summary:
Here is a structured markdown summary of the Georgia House - Day 22 (2026-02-24) session:

## Overview
The session featured a prayer by the chaplain, Father Theodore, who encouraged legislators to take time for spiritual reflection and discernment during the legislative session. The House also recognized the passing of a member of the House family, doorkeeper Mr. Shepherd Green.

## Key Actions
**HB 124**: No details provided
**HB 352**: No details provided

## Bills Introduced (First Reading)
No new bills were introduced.

## Notable Moments
- Prayer and remarks by Father Theodore, the chaplain, encouraging legislators to make time for spiritual reflection and discernment during the legislative session.
- Recognition of the passing of doorkeeper Mr. Shepherd Green.

## Votes
No recorded votes mentioned.

## Attendance
The transcript indicates that the Speaker called for all members to come to the floor multiple times, suggesting a quorum was present.

## Adjournment
The transcript does not include details on when the session adjourned or the next scheduled session.
